jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: At pep.digital, I support the development of both internal tools and client-facing applications. My role involves actively contributing to ongoing projects, improving existing solutions, and collaborating closely with designers and developers to create high-quality digital experiences.

jobs.title: Bachelor Thesis
jobs.description: In cooperation with pep.digital, I completed my Bachelor Thesis on exploring the capabilities of the Astro framework by building a video streaming application as an Progressive Web App. The project focused on evaluating how Astro handles dynamic functionality and real-time features, challenging its traditional role in static site development.

jobs.title: Internship Semester
jobs.description: During my internship at pep.digital, I was involved in various real-world projects that exposed me to a wide range of development workflows and team dynamics. From internal tooling to client solutions, I gained hands-on experience in building and refining software products while deepening my understanding of modern frontend and backend practices.
